::Feline::

"HOTROD!!" 
She fell to the ground and transformed into bot mode.  She slowly 
stood up and looked at Beholder.  with mech fluid running down her 
face and leaking out the corner of her mouth.  She ran up to Beholder 
and spit in his face.  She lashed out with her claws and slashed at 
his face.  She extended her claws and slashed at Beholder's face and 
chest, trying to scratch out his optics, scratch his face and do as 
much damage as possable.  "I GO AND YOU GO WITH ME!!!!!"
Being within inches of Beholder, she started her self destruct 
sequence counting down.  5..4..3..2..1..KABOOOOOOMMM!!!!
